content: k1 from cn finished measurements steam blocked and lying flat 1/2 lc worked over 3 sts top circumference 8 /20 cm slip next stitch to cn and place at front of work k2 then k1 bottom circumference 6 5 /20 cm from cn height 5 / 16 5 cm 1/2 rc worked over 3 sts slip next 2 stitches to cn and place at back of work k1 then abbreviations k2 from cn approx - approximately 1/3 lc worked over 4 sts bor - beginning of round slip next stitch to cn and place at front of work k3 then k1 cm - centimeter from cn cn - cable needle 1/3 rc worked over 4 sts co - cast on slip next 3 stitches to cn and place at back of work k1 then k - knit/knitwise k3 from cn k2tog - knit two together lh - left hand video links m - meters longtail tubular co in the round https //bit ly/3c071jv m1 - make one sewn bobble https //bit ly/3gjd4ee ©2024 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com ~ page 2 chart -reader instructions see pg 4 for row-for-row written instructions pattern with smaller needles co 48 sts using longtail tubular chart cast-on see pg 2 join in the round place unique work all row of chart from right to left marker for bor chart row consist of 18 stitches round 1 k1 sl1p wyif work each row of chart a total of round 2 sl1p wyib p1 3 times per cozy round note if not working tubular co replace these 2 rnds with 1x1 rib rnds 3 * k1 p1 repeat round 3 for 1 5 /4 cm increase round *k2 m1 k3 m1 k11 work from * to end of round 54 sts switch to larger needles note place a stitch marker after each 18-st chart repeat if desired work rnds 1-17 of chart decrease round *k2 k2tog k1 ssk k11 work from * to end of round 48 sts keep using larger needles note remove repeat markers round 1 * k1 p1 repeat round 1 for 1 5 /4 cm work sewn bind off see video link on pg 2 key key finishing weave in ends and give a light steam block to finished knit dimensions on pg 2 purl 1/1 rc 1/1 lc 1/2 rc 1/2 lc 1/1/1 rpc 1/3 rc 1/3 lc 18-st repeat ©2024 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com ~ page 3 row-for-row written instructions see pg 3 for chart-reader instructions pattern with smaller needles co 48 sts using longtail tubular round 9 *p1 1/2 lc p1 1/2 rc p2 1/2 rc p1 1/2 lc p1 cast-on see pg 2 join in the round place unique mark- work from * to end of round er for bor rnds 10-12 * p1 k3 2 times p3 k2 p1 k2 p2 work round 1 k1 sl1p wyif from * to end of round round 2 sl1p
